process-section.title: The Creation Process
process-section.description: We believe that shoes offer a unique opportunity to unleash your inner creativity, elevate your style and make a lasting impression. We're dedicated to transforming each customer's distinct vision into an awesome one-of-a-kind shoe design.

step1.title: 1. Share Your Vision
step1.description: with us and we will bring it to life.

step2.title: 2. Sketch & Approval
step2.description: We're committed to bringing your vision to life just as you imagined. That's why we start by creating a preliminary sketch of your design and sharing it with you for feedback and approval.

step3.title: 3. From sketch to reality
step3.description: Each Sole-Blast shoe is meticulously hand-painted, ensuring a unique and eye-catching result. Then it's shipped straight to your doorstep. Enjoy!

shopItem.description: One shoe, a thousand impressions. Make every step you take a testament to self-expression, a symbol of your uniqueness. Compliments guaranteed!

answer.title: We are committed to completing your order as quickly as possible. The process is as follows:
bullets: The delivery of shoes to our workshop takes approximately 3 business days.
Customization and painting require between 2-7 days, depending on the design complexity.
Shipping takes 5-10 business days for Europe and 7-20 days for other countries.
answer.end: We will keep you updated via email about your order's progress.

description: Worldwide shipping is offered, using only tracked options, to ensure your order's safe arrival.

We partner with reliable shipping services such as DHL, UPS, and FedEx, ensuring your order's safe and prompt delivery. Shipping costs depend on the destination country. The exact shipping cost will be provided during checkout.

As we ship from Europe, there are no import fees for European Union countries. For the rest of the world, it's the buyer's responsibility to check if import duties apply in their country and pay any import taxes and fees that may be charged upon arrival. Please be aware of your country's policies before purchasing.
Your security is our priority. Our site is HTTPS certified, ensuring a 100% secure shopping environment.
We accept the safest payment methods, including credit cards and Paypal.
Everything is hand-crafted and made to order therefore all sales are final and we do not offer refunds.
However, if we make a mistake, such as sending the wrong size or design, we will correct our mistake. Please contact us upon receipt of your order, if there are any issues.

paymentInfo.title: Payment Details
paymentInfo.description: Complete your purchase by providing your payment details.
paymentInfo.iban: You can pay for your orders via IBAN transfer. Complete your order to receive information on how to continue.

SVGProcessSection.title: Create Your Design
steps: 1. Share your vision and let's embark on an artistic journey, creating your unique Sole-Blast shoes!
2. Our artists dive into your idea, turning it into a tangible sketch. They shape your imagination and await your approval, ensuring your vision is brought to life just as you've imagined.
3. This is where the magic happens. Plain shoes are transformed into extraordinary works of art. Each pair is meticulously hand-painted, ensuring a unique and captivating result.
4. Excitement at your doorstep! Your custom-designed shoes arrive, ready to elevate your style.

pricingTiers.title: Pricing Information
pricingTiers.description: The prices that are listed below, are for the custom artwork. Expect an additional cost for the price of the base shoe, which depends on the shoe model of your choice.

tiers.title: Basic Design
tiers.description: Designs that require ~10 hours of effort. EG: Small custom drawings, symbols or characters. Any kind of simple artwork.

tiers.title: Premium Design
tiers.description: Designs that require ~15 hours of effort. EG: More complex and detailed drawings, such as multiple characters, stylized text or logos.

tiers.title: Masterpiece Edition
tiers.description: Designs that require 20+ hours of effort, high-level artistic skills and creativity. EG: High detail characters, abstract/realistic art or graffiti. Almost anything is possible!

pricingTiers.note: * Note that the prices are indicative, the final price will be determined after we process your request.

orderInfo.title: Custom Order Information
orderInfo.description: Help us bring your dream design to life. Please provide as many details and try to be specific in your description, allowing us to better tailor the design to your vision. Feel free to upload any image files or reference any of our existing designs to better communicate your idea. After you've submitted your idea, remember to check your email within the next couple of days. We'll send you a sketch and the final cost of your unique design.

refImg.label: REFERENCE IMAGES
refImg.placeholder: Click or drag a file to this area to upload

radioBtn.label: Do you want to customize shoes you already own?
radioBtn.tooltip: The shoes must be in brand new condition.

shoeDescription.label: SHOE DESCRIPTION
shoeDescription.placeholder:
e.g. The theme is alien invention. Description:
- Base color: Deep purple
- Flaming pyramids and palm tree figures on both sides of the shoe
- On the inner side of the shoe, a UFO shoots a blue beam which causes human figures to levitate
- On the outer side of the shoe, a blue flame meteor is approaching the pyramids below
- On the front of the shoe, a rocket is taking off

itemName.label: ITEM NAME/TYPE
itemName.placeholder: E.g. Louis Vuitton Pocket Organizer Wallet

designDescription.label: DESIGN DESCRIPTION
designDescription.placeholder:
E.g. I want you to paint a panda figure on the wallet.
- The panda shall look like Takashi Murakami's popular panda design, as referenced in the pictures i provided.
- In the belly of the panda, write the initial letters of my name 'NF' using an elegant font and black color. 
- Main colors: Black and white
- Colors for the details: Pink, yellow, brown, light green and light blue.

notFound.text: Uh-oh! This page appears to have been abducted by aliens...

items.question: What does Sole-Blast stand for?
items.answer: In Sole-Blast, we believe that shoes offer a unique opportunity to unleash your inner creativity, elevate your style and make a lasting impression. That's why we're dedicated to transforming each customer's distinct vision into an awesome one-of-a-kind shoe design. Order yours now!

items.question: What do we offer?
items.answer:
Our workshop excels in creating custom painted shoes tailored to your individual style. We provide a range of options, including unique designs inspired by your ideas and an exclusive selection of Sole-Blast originals to choose from.
In addition to shoes, our expertise extends to customizing a diverse array of items such as bags, wallets, skateboards, snowboards, and more. If you're seeking a special customization, simply fill out Your Design form, and let us bring your vision to life!

items.question: How can I order a custom pair of shoes?
items.answer:
To order a custom pair of shoes, follow the instructions listed in Your Design page. You can also browse our store and select one of our suggested captivating designs.
Get ready to pursue new adventures wearing a head-turning unique pair of shoes!

items.question: How long will it take to prepare a custom pair?
items.answer:
We strive to complete your order as quickly as possible:
  • It takes approximately 3 days to get the shoes delivered to our workshop.
  • Customization and painting takes between 3-7 days, depending on the complexity of the design.
  • Shipping takes 5-10 business days for Europe and 7-20 days for other countries.

items.question: Can I send you a pair of shoes?
items.answer: While we typically handle the purchase of shoes in your preferred size, if you have a special pair of shoes for customization, you can send them to us.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We only accept the most secure payment methods, which include Paypal, credit cards and bank transfers.

items.question: Can I request a rush order for a specific event or occasion?
items.answer: Yes, we will do our best to prioritize your order and use the quickest delivery service for your country (additional charges apply). Just include a note with your request when submitting the order.'

items.question: What is the cost for a custom pair?
items.answer: The total cost depends on the chosen base shoe and the complexity of your design. For example, a pair of Nike Air Force 1's costs around 140€, and a simple artwork would cost around €100, totaling €240.

items.question: Are there any special offers or discounts for bulk orders or group purchases?
items.answer: Please contact us in soleblastofficial[at]gmail.com to discuss bulk orders or group purchase discounts.

items.question: Can I select a design that has been painted before?
items.answer: Yes, you can choose any design from our store, but please note that each pair is 100% hand-painted and unique, so we cannot guarantee an exact replica. We'll always aim to make each new pair even better!

items.question: What sizes are available?
items.answer: We can customize any size available on the market. Sizes for kids are also available!

items.question: What shoe brands and models can I choose from?
items.answer: Popular options include Nike Air Force 1's, Vans slip-on's and Vans Old Skool due to their popularity and large painting surface.</br>Other choices include Vans Classic, Dr. Martens, Nike Air Max, Nike Dunk Low and Air Jordan 1.</br>#You can also send us your own pair of shoes if they're in brand new condition.

items.question: How durable is the artwork?
items.answer: Our artwork is crafted using top-quality, eco-friendly materials and best practices to ensure its durability. We guarantee that the artwork is 100% permanent and will not fade over time. Feel free to wear your shoes in all conditions!'

items.question: Can I wash the shoes?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can wash your custom shoes without any issues.

items.question: Do you ship to my country?
items.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide using only tracked shipping options to ensure your order arrives safely.

items.question: What shipping services do you use and what is the cost?
items.answer: We use a variety of reliable shipping services, such as DHL, UPS, and FedEx, to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your order. Shipping costs vary depending on the destination country and the selected shipping service. We will provide you with the exact shipping cost during the checkout process.

items.question: How do I track my order?
items.answer: We'll keep you informed via email about your order's progress. Once we ship the finished product, we'll provide you with the tracking number.

items.question: Where do you ship from?
items.answer: We ship from Athens, Greece.

items.question: Will there be any import fees?
items.answer: We ship from Europe, so there are no import fees for European Union countries. For the rest of the world, it's the buyer's responsibility to check if import duties apply in their country and pay any import taxes and fees that may be charged upon arrival. Please be aware of your country's shipping fees before purchasing.

items.question: What is the return policy?
items.answer: Since each item is custom painted, we cannot accept returns or provide refunds. However, we value customer feedback and will address any issues you may have. Please report any faults or complaints within 3 days of receiving your order. We'll do our best to keep you satisfied.

items.question: Shipping
items.answer: All sneakers are 100% hand-painted and we also need some time to get the shoes delivered to our workshop. Please allow up to 12 business days for processing before shipping. If you need your order urgently, please let us know.</br></br> We utilize a variety of reliable shipping services, such as DHL, UPS, FedEx, and more, to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your order.</br></br>Shipping costs depend on the destination country and the selected shipping service. We will provide the exact shipping cost during the checkout process.

items.question: Return & Exchange
items.answer: All our products are custom made and hand painted. That's why we can not offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on orders. All designs are created upon request, so please ensure you have chosen the correct size, base shoe, and design when ordering. For any questions or for further details/changes on orders, please contact us.

items.question: Privacy
items.answer:
This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from www.sole-blast.com.

When you visit the site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, and time zone. Additionally, as you browse the site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the site, and how you interact with the site. We refer to this automatically-collected information as “Device Information”. We respect your privacy and do not collect cookies.

We collect device information using the following technologies:

“Log files” track actions occurring on the Site and collect data including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps.

When you make a purchase or attempt to make a purchase through the site, we collect certain information from you, including your name, billing address, shipping address, econtact details, and payment information. We refer to this information as “Order Information”.

When we refer to “Personal Information” in this Privacy Policy, we are discussing both Device Information and Order Information.

How do we use your personal information:

We use the Order Information that we collect to fulfill orders placed through the Site (including processing your payment information, arranging for shipping, and providing you with invoices and/or order confirmations). In addition, we use this Order Information to:

  • Communicate with you;
  • Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud; and
  • When in line with the preferences you have shared with us, provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services.


We use the Device Information we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimize our Site (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns).

Sharing your personal information:

We may share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to protect our rights.

Behavioural advertising:

As described above, we use your Personal Information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you. For more information about how targeted advertising works, you can visit the Network Advertising Initiative’s (“NAI”) educational page at www.networkadvertising.org/how-does-it-work.

You can opt out of targeted advertising by using the links below:

  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com
  • Google: https://www.google.com


Additionally, you can opt out of some of these services by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance’s opt-out portal at: http://optout.aboutads.info/.

Do not track:

Please note that we do not alter our Site’s data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.

Your rights:

If you are a European resident, you have the right to access the personal information we hold about you and to request that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us.

Additionally, if you are a European resident, we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfill contracts we might have with you (for example, if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above.

Data retention:

When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Order Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.

Various:

We are not affiliated with the respective brands you may see on our website. We buy the shoes and add our own custom designs on them and pass them on to our valued customers.

Changes:

We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.

Contact us:

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at soleblastofficial[at]gmail.com

success.p: Please check your email for the order information. Thank you for choosing Sole-Blast!

items.question: IBAN
items.answer:
You can pay for your orders via IBAN transfer. If you just completed an order there will be an email sent to your email. Please use the unique order code sent to your email as the payment description. Our IBAN number is:

GR3302 6017 1000 0600 2006 48005

items.question: Credit Card
items.answer: You can purchase exclusive Sole-Blast designs using your credit card. Head into our Shop and discover the design you like.

items.question: PayPal
items.answer: Comming soon. We are working on it.
